text: this is Monalisa she's been a massage
therapist for 40 years or a year on this
exact beach in Phuket Thailand my family
and I met Monalisa today when she
approached us as we were lounging on the
beach
we all got massages from her which cost
seven bucks each and it was absolutely
fantastic she has these magical strong
hands and hits all the pressure points
but the most impressive thing about Mona
Lisa is that she has five children and
she supported them all by making an
average of twenty-five dollars per day
rain or shine she is out here on Patong
Beach working ten hours a day seven days
a week 365 days a year
[Applause]
as Westerners when we travel to places
like Thailand we often don't realize how
much these people are struggling to make
a living Mona Lisa represents all of the
street vendors in Phuket and across
Southeast Asia who are hustling every
day in the hot Sun to make an extra buck
behind their amazing smiles is a
constant struggle to survive so let this
video be a reminder to appreciate your
life if you're the one sitting in the
massage chair and not the other way
around
[Music]
